title: Africa: Growing African Vegetables On Buildings Can Save Space and Feed Cities - New Study
description: [The Conversation Africa] As cities grow, more people need food. However, space for farming is limited in cities. Building facades can offer a solution for growing food. We asked landscape architect Karen Botes to tell us about her research - cultivating traditional African vegetables on walls.

title: Africa: Like Jimi Hendrix Like Mohbad - Kindred Spirits
description: [Vanguard] I first heard about Jimi Hendrix during my early teens. First attraction was his name which elicited interest. The word Hendrix sounded psychedelic to me. Not much later, I was hit by his much talked about music 'Hey Joe' which resonated with me again and again while trying to toy with playing the guitar.

title: Africa: At Least 4.4 Million People Are Stateless, UN Says
description: [DW] The UNHCR annual report said stateless people, often belonging to minority groups, are often deprived of human rights and access to basic services.

title: Africa: 2023 CAF Women's Champions League JKT Queens Vs Mamelodi Sundowns 5th November 2023
